## blockRendering.register() function

Registers a new renderer.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function register(name: string, rendererClass: new (name: string) => Renderer): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | The name of the renderer. |
|  rendererClass | new (name: string) =&gt; [Renderer](./blockly.blockrendering.renderer.md) | The new renderer class to register. |

**Returns:**

void

## Exceptions

{<!-- -->Error<!-- -->} if a renderer with the same name has already been registered.
